column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We ordered the Chicago classic deep dish and also tried a thin crust variety. And to give some semblance of healthiness
column2: we added a family sized spinach salad. The salad was delicious
column3: it was light but the creaminess of the goat cheese definitely paired well with the more sweet strawberries they used as their fruit. The onions also added that sweet crunch.
